mapper.sql: iid, icause, itime, iabout, icount, iincome, ibalance
mapper.insert: insert into income (iid, icause, itime, iabout, icount, iincome, ibalance) values (#{iid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{icause,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{iabout,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{iincome,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ibalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into income
iid,
icause,

iabout,
icount,
iincome,
ibalance,

mapper.update:
update income
icause = #{icause,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
itime = #{itime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
iabout = #{iabout,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icount = #{icount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
iincome = #{iincome,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ibalance = #{ibalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where iid = #{iid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update income set icause = #{icause,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itime = #{itime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, iabout = #{iabout,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icount = #{icount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, iincome = #{iincome,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ibalance = #{ibalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where iid = #{iid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
